response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive offer at a price of $1,350,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and providing you with an exceptional deal that aligns with your valuation of the product. I believe this offer presents a favorable outcome for both parties and looks forward to your positive consideration.", "product_price": 1350000}
